003package es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.corenlpknowledgebasepopulation.xml.definition;
004
005import javax.xml.bind.annotation.XmlRootElement;
006
007import edu.stanford.nlp.pipeline.TokensRegexNERAnnotator;
008import es.uvigo.esei.sing.textproc.step.xml.definition.AbstractProcessingStepParameter;
009
010/**
011 * Parameter for specifying the path a file that will be read by
012 * {@link TokensRegexNERAnnotator}.
013 * <p>
014 * This file specifies additional NER rules
015 * that will be used for matching named entities. It can be generated by the
016 * CoreNLP entity extraction processing step bundled with the TextProc
017 * distribution.
018 * </p>
019 *
020 * @author Alejandro González García
021 */
022@XmlRootElement(name = "nerMappingsFile")
023public final class NERMappingsFileProcessingStepParameter extends AbstractProcessingStepParameter {}
